Our shopkeepers prefer to make a profit.
Tradesman is the forerunner of social support, the guardian of the terbian and the guardian.
Your tribe has 3 rules; Keep your hand open, keep the door open, keep the table open.
Turkish tradesmen have been faced with vandalism, violence and plunder throughout history.
We are trying to build a country where the state and the nation are hand in hand.
There are a few countries in the world with real interest below zero, and Turkey has caught it.
Despite everything in tourism revenues, we had an increase of 18% over the same period last year.
We never gaze at the streets being terrorized. Our shopkeepers also have the power to dismiss these events.
We need our unity, cohesion and brotherhood. There is a brotherhood in the pulp of this land.

Protect the rights of the individual, not the police state, in democratic countries.
The state that regards its own citizen as a threat to itself is a cruel and cruel state.
The police of this country, the owner of this state, the citizen of the Bingöl mezrasada sahuridir.
76 million together we are the owner of this country. Police are different, soldier is different, officer is not different. Everyone has an equal position in this state.
We are a country that implements democratic reforms. Certainly in such a process it will be a mistake.
The important thing is to fight against them in the framework of the laws and to give the necessary punishments.
Today, the way we approach the citizens of the police, especially in the West, the EU, has remained very far behind us.
They are making trades from their hands to scare the Turkish police. This organization is a brilliant organization that can not be polluted with negative examples
The crime struggle of our police was very often criticized. The media was targeted by social media through numerous lies and slander.
This nation knows the police very well. Make sure that he has the police as his own son.
It's not who's what, it's important what the nation says. It is not the headlines of some newspapers, but the headlines of the nation.
Throughout the history of this nation, the police have taken over. He embraced them when they were made unfair. We do not listen to unfounded deception.
We are not paralyzed minds who curse the police of this country shamelessly, we look at the sentiment of the nation.
He's afraid of the outrageous. He is unlawful, he is afraid of law.
No one brings hundreds of wounded policemen to the agenda. Stoned, sticky, molotovoid attacks do not have anything to stop.
We have not seen police cope for months with all kinds of vandalism and violence. But the activists are rubbing the back.
Our police use TOMA when it comes to its place, it also uses pepper. This is for the security of our country.
I would like to ask our police department not to upset their morale in the face of these attacks.
